title: Pricing
intro: If we're ONLY talking about money... For a full-time position, I expect to be compensated $150,000 per year (including the value of benefits). For a part-time position, $75 per hour. For freelance work, $125 per hour.
outro: These figures assume a halfway-interesting job for an ethical, but not hugely exciting project. The more deeply you speak to my values and interests, the more I'm happy to discount the above. My annual expenses are less than $20,000, and I don't much care about money, so - for the right job - compensation won't be an issue.
